name: Artifact Hunt
description:
In this game jam submission for the Kindred Community Jam, a museum is looking for broken artifacts from an age long past. The manager of the museum called "The Beginning" has hired you to find 16 shards of various artifacts so that the museum can put together the shards and put the artifacts on display. The shards are lost in a maze that the museum has uncovered, people have gone in to find the shards, but not all of them returned, and all of them came out with no shards.

*Note* If there is a save already, delete it, because of the way the save system was implemented, the save was carried over in the build.

*Note* You may have to approve the game in security and privacy on a Mac because apple computers cannot check itch app downloads for virus's.
